schema.description: 属性值。一个属性下最多可以添加50个不同的属性值。

ErrorMessage.example: The property value is used by another property.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "1CBAFFAB-B697-4049-A9B1-67E1FC5F****",
  "CreateResult": {
    "PropertyId": 390,
    "PropertyKey": "department",
    "SavePropertyValueModel": {
      "SavePropertyValues": [
        {
          "PropertyValueId": 978,
          "PropertyValue": "HR"
        }
      ],
      "FailedPropertyValues": [
        {
          "PropertyId": 390,
          "PropertyValue": "HR",
          "ErrorCode": "ExistedPropertyValue",
          "ErrorMessage": "The property value is used by another property."
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<CreatePropertyResponse>
    <RequestId>499B0E01-8AE3-5099-95CE-E69CF4DBE177</RequestId>
    <CreateResult>
        <PropertyId>390</PropertyId>
        <PropertyKey>department</PropertyKey>
        <SavePropertyValueModel>
            <SavePropertyValues>
                <PropertyValueId>978</PropertyValueId>
                <PropertyValue>HR</PropertyValue>
            </SavePropertyValues>
            <FailedPropertyValues>
                <PropertyId>390</PropertyId>
                <PropertyValue>HR</PropertyValue>
                <ErrorCode>ExistedPropertyValue</ErrorCode>
                <ErrorMessage>property value is used by other property</ErrorMessage>
            </FailedPropertyValues>
        </SavePropertyValueModel>
    </CreateResult>
</CreatePropertyResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 创建用户自定义属性
description:
- 一个阿里云账号下最多可以创建10个不同的属性。每个属性包括一个属性名（PropertyKey）和多个属性值（PropertyValue）。
- 一个属性下最多可以添加50个不同的属性值。
